templates.context: <character_1> is working in a busy restaurant. A customer gives their order to <character_1>. <character_1> grabs an opaque <container_1> and fills it with <state_1>. Then <character_1> grabs another opaque <container_2> and fills it with <state_2>.
templates.causal_event: A co-worker named <character_2> didn't hear the customer's request and swaps the <state_event> in the <container_event> with <state_swap> while <character_1> was attending to another task.
